section:
Your ship, crew and cargo are lost to the deep, dark sea. Cross them off your Adventure Sheet. Your only thought now is to save yourself. Roll two dice.
If the score is greater than your Rank, you are drowned ().
If the score is less than or equal to your Rank, you manage to find some driftwood, and make it back to shore.
Lose Stamina points equal to the score of one die roll and, if you can survive that, .
